title: bmy.guide
description:
bmy.guide is a ReFi ecosystem focused on environmental and business locations. It features a peer-to-peer search engine, social platform for travelers, GeoMarket for trading shares, play-to-earn quizzes, NFT marketplace, and a business review aggregator. 
On bmy.guide, get inspired, share travel adventures, and connect with a lively community of travelers, ecologists, and nature enthusiasts. Earn rewards with quizzes, trade global digital locations, and support environmental sustainability.
